text: Typically, when the block confirmation number reaches 250~300, it can be considered secure from becoming reversible.The most accurate method is to follow the calculation based on the LIB (Last Irreversible Block). A transaction is considered irreversible when its status is 'MINED' and the block height is less than the LastIrreversibleBlockHeight in the ChainStatus.
title: At what block confirmation number on the aelf blockchain can we consider it unlikely that a chain becomes reversible?
